tagline: Detect and decode barcodes and QR codes in images.
description: The Barcode Detection API detects barcodes and QR codes in images, allowing you to build scanners directly in the browser without heavy external libraries.

projects.title: Smart Pantry Inventory
projects.description: Scan grocery items using your camera to look up products and add them to a digital inventory.

concepts: Passing a video stream element to `detect()`

name: EyeDropper API

tagline: Sample colors from anywhere on the user's screen.
description: The EyeDropper API provides a mechanism for creating an eyedropper tool that allows users to select colors from their screen, including outside the browser window.

projects.title: Universal Design Palette
projects.description: A tool for designers to grab colors from any website or app and save them to a palette.

concepts: The `open()` method and handling the promise

name: Document Picture-in-Picture API

tagline: Open an always-on-top window that persists over other apps.
description: Unlike the standard PiP which only works for video, the *Document* PiP API allows you to open any HTML content (timers, notes, custom players) in a floating window.

projects.title: Always-On-Top Focus Timer
projects.description: A Pomodoro timer that floats over your other windows so you never lose track of time.

concepts: Copying styles from main window to PiP window

name: Web MIDI API

tagline: Connect musical instruments (MIDI) to the browser.
description: The Web MIDI API allows web applications to list, open, and communicate with MIDI devices like keyboards and synthesizers plugged into the computer.

projects.title: Virtual Synthesizer
projects.description: Connect a physical MIDI keyboard to your computer and play sounds generated by the browser.

concepts: Mapping MIDI notes (0-127) to Audio Frequency (Hz)
search_terms: convert midi note to frequency javascript

name: Web Share API

tagline: Share content using the device's native sharing dialog.
description: The Web Share API invokes the native sharing mechanism of the device, allowing users to share text, URLs, or files with other apps (like WhatsApp, Mail, or AirDrop).

projects.title: Viral Quote Card Generator
projects.description: Create a beautiful image from text and share it directly to Instagram or Twitter apps.

concepts: Creating a file object from a Canvas blob

tagline: Connect and use game controllers in the browser.
description: The Gamepad API gives you access to game controllers (Xbox, PlayStation, etc.) connected via USB or Bluetooth.

projects.title: Gamepad Website Navigator
projects.description: An accessibility tool that lets you navigate a website using only an Xbox/PS controller.

name: View Transitions API

tagline: Create seamless animations between page states.
description: This API provides a mechanism to easily create animated transitions between different DOM states, even across page loads in single-page apps.

projects.title: Seamless Photo Gallery
projects.description: A photo gallery where clicking a thumbnail smoothly 'morphs' it into the full-screen version.

name: Broadcast Channel API

tagline: Communication between tabs or windows of the same site.
description: The Broadcast Channel API allows basic communication between browsing contexts (windows, tabs, frames, or iframes) and workers on the same origin.

projects.title: Dual-Window Presentation Tool
projects.description: Open a 'Remote' in one window and the 'Presentation' in another. Clicking the remote updates the presentation instantly.
